Robocon

National Robotics Competition

ABU Robocon is national level Robotics competition, Where team is tasked with a problem statement which is to be completed in a given time period.

I was part of the programming and electronics team. My responsiblites during the competition were to write firmware for the microcontrollers and drivers for the peripherials As part of the Electronics team, I designed the main controller PCB and main power delivery board for autonomous and manual robot.

We ranked 4th out of 107 national Team in Robocon 2018 Also, had the 3rd fastest task completion record for the year.
